localize.text: Don’t be so tense, just close your eyes... Yes, just like that.
Make yourself as comfortable as possible, so that your mind is comfortable too.
It tickles, no? But just wait.
Feel water and air during different seasons, inside a different dream and a different body, forgetting and remembering everything.
I don’t know what it is.
But I already left some time ago.
Don’t look for me. I will no longer teach you.
But A, I want to be part of the Cogito experiment! I'm ready!
The grains covering the floor shine with light.
Kill me... Please kill me A... I'm sorry... I’m sorry...
As you commanded, I've made the job applicant form for our corporation.
The reception is good. Everyone thinks it’s a new employment method that does not concentrate on just one’s abilities.
The number of applicants are projected to meet the initial calculation.
We will soon hire people according to the priority value you’ve stated.
I’ve also arranged a meeting with TimeTrack.
... Are you thinking about all those who have left?
